column.name: dangerous_chemical_children_type_msds_url
column.Comment: 危险化学品子类msds卡的访问地址

column.name: dangeroussource_place_department_user_id
column.Comment: 危险源地点所属部门的员工ID(user表)

column.Comment: 厂区地图文件访问路径

column.name: factory_area_map_filepath
column.Comment: 厂区地图文件本地地址

column.Comment: 厂区地图-危险源地点编号

column.name: function_url
column.Comment: 权限前端页面跳转路径

column.name: dangeroussource_place_inspect_type_id
column.Comment: 危险源-检查类型(复合中间表)ID(dangeroussource_place_inspect_type表)

column.name: rectify_user_id
column.Comment: 当前巡检任务对应的整改人ID(user表)

column.name: inspect_attendance_restday_starttime
column.Comment: 非出勤日开始巡检时间

column.name: inspect_attendance_restday_endtime
column.Comment: 非出勤日结束巡检时间

column.name: inspect_attendance_status
column.Comment: 出勤日状态(出勤日/非出勤日)

column.name: dangeroussource_place_attendance_workday_frequency
column.Comment: 危险源地点的出勤日巡检频率

column.name: dangeroussource_place_attendance_restday_frequency
column.Comment: 危险源地点的非出勤日巡检频率

column.Comment: 巡检图片文件访问路径

column.name: inspect_picture_filepath
column.Comment: 巡检图片文件本地地址

column.name: rectify_picture_fileurl
column.Comment: 整改图片文件访问路径

column.name: rectify_picture_filepath
column.Comment: 整改图片文件本地地址

column.name: rectify_user_realname
column.Comment: 整改任务的整改人真实姓名

column.name: review_fail_reason
column.Comment: 问题描述(审核不通过原因)

column.name: review_picture_fileurl
column.Comment: 审核图片文件访问路径

column.name: review_picture_filepath

column.name: supplies_allocation_name
column.Comment: 调拨的应急物资名称（应急物资名称-规格）

column.name: supplies_allocation_unit
column.Comment: 调拨的应急物资的单位

column.name: supplies_allocation_status
column.Comment: 申请状态(1申请中;2已同意;3已拒绝)

column.name: user_name
column.Comment: 记录当前用户真实姓名

column.name: user_picture_url
column.Comment: 用户头像图片的访问路径
